name: fetch_chapters
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool mangaverse_api.
Tool description: Unleash the World of Manga with MangaVerse API!  Discover a captivating universe of manga from Japan, Korea, and China, all conveniently translated into English. 
API description: Fetches the list of chapters for a given manga ID from the Mangaverse API.

is_id.description: The ID of the manga for which chapters need to be fetched. Defaults to '6486b7547ae7cb74845df856'.
